channel.title: How do you make your own moparscape server?

item.title: How do you make your own moparscape server?
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo1 Nintendo
item.description:
@Nintendo1 wrote:

This Topic Will Get Locked!

This topic has been Locked for Breaking our Terms of Services and/or Forum Rules

To make sure that your topics are not locked in the Future, please do the following:

Read the Moparisthebest.com Rules - Must be Followed when Posting Anywhere on both forums

Read the RS2 Server Development/Help Rules - Must be Followed when posting in the RS2 Server Development/Help Forum

Read the RS2 Server Download Rules - Must be Followed when Posting in the RS2 Server Download Section

Read the RS2 Server Advertisement Rules - Must be followed when Posting in the Server Advertisment forum

Read the RS2 Server Tutorial Rules - Must be Followed when Posting in the RS2 Server Tutorial Forum

Read the Aryan Private Server Scripts Rules - Must be Followed when Posting in the Aryan Private Server Scripts Forum

Read the RS Private Server Client Hacking Rules - Must be Followed when Posting in the Private Server Client Hacking Forum

Read the MoparScape Questions Guide before Posting a Question - A lot of Frequently Asked Questions are already Answered

Reason: go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,59918.0.html read the rules

and all other stickied information.

Also, please remember not to:

Bump Posts
Spam Posts
Create Multiple Threads
Post in the Wrong Forums

This will only Annoy Moderators and Other members, and there is a high Possibility your Threads wont be Looked at.

All Terms of Services and Rules must be followed at all times. Continuously breaking our rules will force us to take actions against your account

Please read the mopar rules at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,41352.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make your own moparscape server?
item.dc:creator: @m_jon_h m jon h
item.description:
@m_jon_h wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,59918.0.html read that and the rest of the rules but
download a source in server downloads edit it using tutorials and your own coding then download hamachi at www.hamachi.cc click the triangle in the bottom right ,create new network and log on with your ip which is at the top of the hamachi screen e.g 5.90.90.101 ,then advertise in server advertisement but use the right layout!
